entry.title: Changes to BIP-360 - Pay to Quantum Resistant Hash (P2QRH)
entry.summary: In a recent exchange, the usefulness of a pay-to-taproot (p2tr) primitive in Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs) was affirmed. However, there was a concern about the commitment required for thorough review due to time constraints. The individual acknowledged the importance of the proposal and expressed an intention to possibly conduct a more detailed examination in the future. This discussion highlights the ongoing efforts to enhance Bitcoin's infrastructure, underscoring the community's commitment to careful consideration and review of proposed improvements. The dialogue also reflects the collaborative nature of development within the Bitcoin ecosystem, where contributions are carefully vetted and improvements are made with consensus.
